## Source: ossf-package-analysis (424243b64172b0ade3ab912a7a4b142ff734bc8273f3fb61800215bf53b97dab)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'stark-recurser' @ 5.0.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
